::FireBlade::
FireBlade finally finished his new blade and now it was the true 
fireblade.  He figured out that by creating a small motor in the hilt 
of the sword that would spin two disks he could cause the protons to 
spin faster creating heat throughout the sword. By rewiring the 
proton energy he managed to create a flame around the sword. 
"Perfect" he said aloud to himself.
He then turned to talk to SwitchBlade now fining him gone. 
He checked his sensor of where SwitchBlade was and started running 
through the base. HE transformed at the exit and continued going 
towards the CF once again.
"I have failed......"
